entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 a.m. CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Snow mixed with rain this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
